content: I've got to find some richer stock routes so that everyone has more goods to pick from! But even beyond wishes, this moment's going straight into the logbook.

content: {A喜欢}That was the 3,141st shooting star that just passed by. What a special number, just like this moment — truly worth remembering.

content: {A歪头}If shooting stars can hear our wishes, maybe I should ask them... <style=SizeSmall>What does everyone truly need?</style>

content: <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, {A笑眯眯}thank you for choosing to live here with us. I'm sure we'll share many more wonderful moments watching shooting stars together!

content: {A害羞挠头}I know, wishing on meteors might just be wishful thinking, but my notebook's bursting with wishes...

content: I've loved numbers since I was little. While others would cry over math homework, I treated it like a game.
